attributes.action: Bring back public toilets to our parks and villages or make it legal to urinate and defecate in the street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am totally fed up of having to loiter around my own house when I take my dog for a walk, due to my house being the only place with a toilet that is accessible to me, bring back public toilets in parks and villages, urgently, I'm bursting! and so is the British public! And install security cameras outside them all to keep the vandals away!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
